Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires retailers to post warning signs of the tracking and collecting of customers biometric data through electronic devices
Summary: Requires retailers to post warning signs of the tracking and collecting of customers biometric data through electronic devices; provides for civil penalties.
LawCode: Add ยง390-f, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring retailers to post warning signs of the tracking of customers through electronic devices that track, monitor, and collect biometric identifier information on customers
